Total Size...........: 500,20 MB

This compilation has loads of great songs that will keep you coming back to listen to this CD for years to come. It contains pulse-pounding tunes each with variety in styles from the artists. It's easy to visualize some MK fight scenes listening to this music. The soundtrack stands by itself as one of the best. In the movie, the songs unfortunately came across as monotonus because similar songs were inserted back-to-back in the fight scenes. (part of that was because of the music selection and part of that was because every fight scene was just another fight scene and not much more important than the previous one). MK2 was (I'm sorry to say) a B movie, but the soundtrack is an A+++
